name: Out of Control-Demo 1
description:
Description

Out of Control is a platformer where the controls randomize each level!

Play through10 levels and fight a challenging boss in a game that makes you say 'Which one is jump again?'

Features
  • Hand drawn art
  • Frustrating but satisfying gameplay
  • 10 levels
  • A challenging final boss
Additional Info

Additional information can be found on the Health Potion Studios website

Credits:

Artist/Composer: Pan Lean
Level Designer: Holden Wagner
Everything else: Alex Wagner
